code: import axios from'axios';var API=axios.create({baseURL:"http://localhost:3000/api"});export var getAllBooks=function getAllBooks(){return API.get('/books');};export var saveBook=function saveBook(newBook){return API.post('/book',newBook);};export var deleteBook=function deleteBook(id){return API.delete("/book/".concat(id));};var apis={getAllBooks:getAllBooks,saveBook:saveBook,deleteBook:deleteBook};export default apis;
